roles.note: Arg0 not expected with the adjective.

example.name: arg1, concatenation
example.text: Entropy also is simple to describe and explain qualitatively.

roleset.name: childlike, naive, or not very smart
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: arg1
example.text: He thought she was simple because she fell for the story about the dead New Englanders.
